description:
All income of AYA goes towards improving our relationship with our nature.

~

-Request the badge 4 this coin for free at our space, you'll receive XP. You can sell this coin to anyone, no badge needed.-
 
~
 
üçÄ Beautiful You üçÄ
 
Everyone deserves to realize how lucky we all are! To have our senses, taste, touch etc. To be able to breath, eat, drink and dream. Some may seem to be luckier than others, however the one that realizes his luck is the wealthiest. If we focus on 1 of our abilities, we can realize how lucky we are with this abundance. And it‚Äôs all thanks to nature, you. May this clover remind you to connect with nature, the colors, the wind and especially your heart. May we all realize how lucky we are. The clover also represents our connection with the rest of nature & each other.
 
~
 
üçÄ Advenature -Easter eggs-

Bugsy, Lady and Rupsalot were playing hide and seek when a HUGE mysterious gold object fell from the sky and nearly hit them! Thankfully they didn‚Äôt get hurt, but now they can‚Äôt find each other! Who can reunite these 3 loyal friends? The hero who does, receives a special gift: The 1 of a kind 3D animated video NFT of this adventure!
There are 330 slightly different NFTs in this collection and 3 unique's. Close ups of Bugsy, Lady and Rupsalot, you'll know when you see them ;). Collect all 3, if this hasn‚Äôt been accomplished within 1 month after all NFTs have been sold, the video NFT goes on the auction.

~

üçÄ Treasure Coins are Golden Tickets
 
All coins in this collection are Treasure Coins, we renamed it to Golden Tickets. If you own 1 or more Golden Tickets of 10 or more different Coin collections when we release the ‚ÄúGOLD COIN‚Äù badge, you are able to win a real gold coin!
 
~

üçÄ Supply 
 
Golden Clover Coin edition #1 has 333 coins. There is also a 3D animated video NFT of this collection! 3 of the NFTs in this collection are Golden Tickets to win a Unique video NFT for free! The next AYA Coin Collections will vary in supply, some will only have a few.
 
~

Created by 3Demian & Rising Sun ~ AYA nature
Infinite Love AYA nature ‚ù§Ô∏è

~
